snippet: Lawmakers voted to raise the smoking age to 21, approving a measure that would make California the second state to adopt a higher age limit.
abstract: California lawmakers approve measure that will raise legal smoking age to 21 from 18; Gov Jerry Brown has not indicated whether he will sign measure.
lead_paragraph: Lawmakers voted to raise the smoking age to 21, approving a measure that would make California the second state to adopt a higher age limit.

headline.main: California: Bill Raising Smoking Age Sent to Governor
headline.print_headline: California: Bill Raising Smoking Age Sent to Governor
